event.title: passed through east of the present township in May 1827

data.event: He passed through east of the present township in May 1827.

event.title: opened in the late 1850s on the south side of Macintyre Brook, and in 1862

data.event: The inn opened in the late 1850s on the south side of Macintyre Brook, and in 1862 a town was surveyed on the higher, northern side.
Inglewood Post Office opened on 16 September 1866.
Most of the hinterland consisted of station holdings which were selected as early as 1848 and were the start of the wool, cattle and wheat base of the region.
A school was opened in 1872 and a hospital was built in 1921.
A school was opened in 1872 and a hospital was built in 1921.
Anglican, Catholic and Presbyterian churches opened in 1894, 1902 and 1906 respectively.
